title: Chosen Wukong?
body: I play a lot of YI, and Im a fan of the Chosen Yi skin purely because of that brutal lightsaber. who doesnt love Star Wars AMIRITE! I just had a game where I was laying down some jedi force talk to the enemy team because I had a wukong with me as well, and was calling him my padawan because Yi trained Wukong in lore, so I was thinking, why dont they make a Chosen Wukong skin? Or star wars themed in anyway, to reassert that mentor student bond but in a Star wars way. The wukong suggested a double bladed saber staff. I concur.
